ygData.subject: Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Here we go again, insulting people who ask for help. Maybe she honestly didn t know that all of the CD keys were different, but it is assumed that she is
ygData.messageBody:
Here we go again, insulting people who ask for help. Maybe she honestly
didn't know that all of the CD keys were different, but it is assumed that
she is trying to scam people out of their accounts. Give her credit! This is
why I left the group the first time, because people assumed the worst and
instead of explaining things NICELY.

First off, the CD keys are all different. I don't know who told you they
were the same or why.

Second off, old accounts can NOT be reactivated just like that. EverQuest
holds onto your unused and unpaid for accounts for six months before
deleting it.


-= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
-= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
-= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
